DOC.brief_summary: This clinical study conduct identify effective drug concentration dose frequency BOL-303242-X ( Mapracorat ) ophthalmic suspension , treatment inflammation follow cataract surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation BOL-303242-X Versus Vehicle Treatment Inflammation Following Cataract Surgery
